name: Bully Or Treat
description:
Dev Time: (October 15 - October 31)

This is the first of many games to be made on stream by me and the people watching. Every month a new game will be started and anyone can join in and help make the game! Anyone is able to join, just click: https://www.twitch.tv/milrock15, give me a follow (or not, its not needed) and during my stream if you submit to the discord, i will add it.
